title: Victorian bushfire tragedy and Queensland flood crisis | 7NEWS
description: Victorian bushfire victim Max Hobson died defending his property after sparks from a trailer ignited the devastating Longwood blaze, with his body found 100 metres from his ute. Ex-tropical cyclone Koji has caused severe flooding in southeast Queensland, cutting off Yumgela and forcing evacuations in Claremont. Hero police officer Amy Scott, who stopped the Bondi Junction stabbing rampage, has been diagnosed with a rare and aggressive form of breast cancer, with a fundraiser raising over $300,000 for her medical costs. title: Iran claims protests under control as death toll nears 550 | 7NEWS
description: Iran's foreign minister claims anti-government protests have subsided and are under control, despite the death toll reaching almost 550. The government blames Israel and the US for the weeks-long violence, while state television broadcasts pro-government demonstrations in Tehran. Donald Trump has announced his administration is monitoring the situation and arranging a meeting between American and Iranian officials. title: Victorian bushfires and Queensland floods devastate communities | 7NEWS
description: A Victorian bushfire at Longwood, ignited by sparks from a trailer, has claimed the life of cattle farmer Max Hobson and destroyed over 350 homes and businesses across the state. Ex-tropical cyclone Koji has brought severe flooding to Queensland's southeast, cutting off Yungela, forcing evacuations in Claremont, and inundating at least 20 homes. Multiple fires continue to burn out of control in Victoria while thunderstorms are forecast for Queensland's Gold Coast and Sunshine Coast. title: Elon Musk's Grok AI faces global bans | 7NEWS
description: Malaysia and Indonesia have banned Elon Musk's AI chatbot Grok amid concerns it's being used to create non-consensual sexualised images of women and children. The UK communications regulator Ofcom has launched an investigation into X, with British Technology Secretary Liz Kendall announcing that deepfake and non-consensual images will be made illegal in the UK. If found guilty, X faces fines of up to 10% of its global revenue and potential platform ban in Britain. title: Bondi Junction hero cop diagnosed with cancer | 7NEWS
description: NSW Police Inspector Amy Scott, the officer who stopped the Bondi Junction stabbing attacker, has been diagnosed with a rare and aggressive form of breast cancer. The mother of two is facing significant medical costs as she battles the illness. A police force fundraiser established to support her treatment has already raised more than $300,000. title: Cause of Victorian bushfire revealed
description: It has been revealed sparks from a trailer ignited the Longwood blaze that killed cattle farmer Max Hobson. Multiple blazes continue to burn across Victoria, however there are currently no emergency evacuation warnings in place. #fire #bushfire #victoria #longwood #firefighter

title: Toddler killed in Melbourne housefire
description: A toddler has been killed after fire engulfed a house in Fawkner in Melbourne's north. #fire #housefire #toddler #melbourne #victoria

title: Van plows into crowd during Iran protest in LA
description: At least two people have been injured after a truck drove through protestors during a march against the Iranian regime in Los Angeles. #iran #protest #march #demonstration #losangeles

title: Mattel releases first autistic Barbie doll
description: Dollmaking company Mattel is celebrating diversity, releasing the first autistic Barbie doll after 18 months spent working with autism activists. #barbie #mattel #doll #autism #diversity

title: Kevin Rudd to stand down as US ambassador
description: Former prime minister Kevin Rudd will step down as Australia's ambassador to the United States, Prime Minister Anthony Albanese announced in a press conference this morning. #kevinrudd #usa #us #ambassador #auspol

title: Burst water main floods streets in Summer Hill, Sydney
description: A burst water main has flooded streets at Summer Hill in Sydney's inner west. #watermain #flood #summerhill #innerwest #sydney

title: Kevin Rudd steps down as ambassador to US
description: Anthony Albanese has insisted there was no external pressure from the Trump administration for Kevin Rudd to step down from his role as ambassador. #kevinrudd #usa #ambassador #trump #auspol

title: Elephant kills 20 people in India's east
description: A wild elephant has killed 20 people in nine days in India's Jharkhand state. #elephant #india #jharkhand #asianelephant #farmer

title: Alyssa Healy announces retirement from cricket after Australia v India series
description: Australia captain Alyssa Healy has announced she will retire from cricket in March. The 35-year-old wicketkeeper-batter has scored over 7000 international runs and will reach 300 internationals if she plays five of the seven matches in the upcoming home series against India, her last for Australia.  Watch every ball of the Australia v India series live and free on Channel 7 and 7plus from February 15. #alyssahealy #cricket #australia #india #ausvind
